name: Five Nights Overseas (FNaF Fan Game)
description:
This is a demo! You may expect some glitches, unfinished stuff, exploits, and other issues. There are also only 5 nights in this demo.

You are a man named George McAllen. You got a job as a security guard on a cargo ship for a week.

To get to the game instructions, click on the button labelled 'more' on the title. Then click the button labelled 'how to play'. All important instructions are in this menu.
